definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: leader, chief (= ram, as leader of flock ? cf. Di Ex 15:15 Ol:§142 f Lag:BN 170 & v. Ez Eze 34:17)—cstr. [[אֵל]] Ez Eze 31:11; pl. cstr. [[אֵילֵי]] Ex 15:15, Ez Eze 17:13 + 2Ki 24:15 Qr (Kt [[אולי]] v. [[אוּל]]); [[אֵלֵי]] Ez Eze 32:21 (del. Co, v. LXX).—leader, chief [[מוֹאָב]] ´[[א]] Ex 15:15; [[הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[א]] Ez Eze 17:13, 2Ki 24:15 Qr; [[גּוֹיִם]] ´[[א]] Ez Eze 31:11 ([[אֵלִים]] Job 41:17 v. sub [[אלה]]; perh. [[אֵלֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 31:14 but cf. infr. IV. [[איל]] & also [[אֶל]] Note 1).
